        public static void downloadResourcesAsSupervisor(String key,
                                                 String localFile,
                                                 ClientBlobStore cb)
                                          throws AuthorizationException,
                                                 KeyNotFoundException,
                                                 IOException

        Meant to be called only by the supervisor for stormjar/stormconf/stormcode files.

        パラメータ:
        key -
        localFile -
        cb -
        例外:
        AuthorizationException
        KeyNotFoundException
        IOException

      • unJar

        public static void unJar(File jarFile,
                         File toDir)
                  throws IOException

        Unpack matching files from a jar. Entries inside the jar that do not match the given pattern will be skipped.

        パラメータ:
        jarFile - the .jar file to unpack
        toDir - the destination directory into which to unpack the jar
        例外:
        IOException

      • copyBytes

        public static void copyBytes(InputStream in,
                             OutputStream out,
                             int buffSize)
                      throws IOException

        Copies from one stream to another.

        パラメータ:
        in - InputStream to read from
        out - OutputStream to write to
        buffSize - the size of the buffer
        例外:
        IOException

      • unTar

        public static void unTar(File inFile,
                         File untarDir)
                  throws IOException

        Given a Tar File as input it will untar the file in a the untar directory passed as the second parameter

        This utility will untar “.tar” files and “.tar.gz”,“tgz” files.

        パラメータ:
        inFile - The tar file as input.
        untarDir - The untar directory where to untar the tar file.
        例外:
        IOException

      • isZkAuthenticationConfiguredStormServer

        public static boolean isZkAuthenticationConfiguredStormServer(Map conf)

        Is the cluster configured to interact with ZooKeeper in a secure way? This only works when called from within Nimbus or a Supervisor process.

        パラメータ:
        conf - the storm configuration, not the topology configuration
        戻り値:
        true if it is configured else false.

      • isZkAuthenticationConfiguredTopology

        public static boolean isZkAuthenticationConfiguredTopology(Map conf)

        Is the topology configured to have ZooKeeper authentication.

        パラメータ:
        conf - the topology configuration
        戻り値:
        true if ZK is configured else false

      • getWorkerACL

        public static List<org.apache.zookeeper.data.ACL> getWorkerACL(Map conf)

      • getDU

        public static long getDU(File dir)

        Takes an input dir or file and returns the disk usage on that local directory. Very basic implementation.

        パラメータ:
        dir - The input dir to get the disk space of this local dir
        戻り値:
        The total disk space of the input local directory

        public static String threadDump()

      • unZip

        public static void unZip(File inFile,
                         File unzipDir)
                  throws IOException

        Given a File input it will unzip the file in a the unzip directory passed as the second parameter

        パラメータ:
        inFile - The zip file as input
        unzipDir - The unzip directory where to unzip the zip file.
        例外:
        IOException

      • zipFileSize

        public static long zipFileSize(File myFile)
                        throws IOException

        Given a zip File input it will return its size Only works for zip files whose uncompressed size is less than 4 GB, otherwise returns the size module 2^32, per gzip specifications

        パラメータ:
        myFile - The zip file as input
        戻り値:
        zip file size as a long
        例外:
        IOException

      • zeroIfNaNOrInf

        public static double zeroIfNaNOrInf(double x)

      • parseJvmHeapMemByChildOpts

        public static Double parseJvmHeapMemByChildOpts(String input,
                                                Double defaultValue)

        parses the arguments to extract jvm heap memory size in MB.

        パラメータ:
        input -
        defaultValue -
        戻り値:
        the value of the JVM heap memory setting (in MB) in a java command.

      • toPositive

        public static int toPositive(int number)

        A cheap way to deterministically convert a number to a positive value. When the input is positive, the original value is returned. When the input number is negative, the returned positive value is the original value bit AND against Integer.MAX_VALUE(0x7fffffff) which is not its absolutely value.

        パラメータ:
        number - a given number
        戻り値:
        a positive number.
